resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

worklogs.comment:
kou opened a new pull request #2264: ARROW-2848: [Packaging] Use lib*10.deb instead of lib*0.deb
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/2264
 
 
   Because we change so version from 0.0.0 to 10.0.0.

----------------------------------------------------------------
This is an automated message from the Apache Git Service.
To respond to the message, please log on GitHub and use the
URL above to go to the specific comment.
 
For queries about this service, please contact Infrastructure at:
users@infra.apache.org

xhochy closed pull request #2264: ARROW-2848: [Packaging] Use lib*10.deb instead of lib*0.deb
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/2264
 
 
   

This is a PR merged from a forked repository.
As GitHub hides the original diff on merge, it is displayed below for
the sake of provenance:

As this is a foreign pull request (from a fork), the diff is supplied
below (as it won't show otherwise due to GitHub magic):

diff --git a/dev/tasks/linux-packages/debian.ubuntu-trusty/control b/dev/tasks/linux-packages/debian.ubuntu-trusty/control
index 9732ebdcae..298b3c76c6 100644
--- a/dev/tasks/linux-packages/debian.ubuntu-trusty/control
+++ b/dev/tasks/linux-packages/debian.ubuntu-trusty/control
@@ -18,15 +18,14 @@ Build-Depends-Indep: libglib2.0-doc
 Standards-Version: 3.9.6
 Homepage: https://arrow.apache.org/
 
-Package: libarrow0
+Package: libarrow10
 Section: libs
 Architecture: any
 Multi-Arch: same
 Pre-Depends: ${misc:Pre-Depends}
 Depends:
   ${misc:Depends},
-  ${shlibs:Depends},
-  libjemalloc1
+  ${shlibs:Depends}
 Description: Apache Arrow is a data processing library for analysis
  .
  This package provides library files.
@@ -37,7 +36,7 @@ Architecture: any
 Multi-Arch: same
 Depends:
   ${misc:Depends},
-  libarrow0 (= ${binary:Version})
+  libarrow10 (= ${binary:Version})
 Description: Apache Arrow is a data processing library for analysis
  .
  This package provides header files.
@@ -50,7 +49,7 @@ Pre-Depends: ${misc:Pre-Depends}
 Depends:
   ${misc:Depends},
   ${shlibs:Depends},
-  libarrow0 (= ${binary:Version})
+  libarrow10 (= ${binary:Version})
 Description: Apache Arrow is a data processing library for analysis
  .
  This package provides library files.
diff --git a/dev/tasks/linux-packages/debian.ubuntu-trusty/libarrow-python0.install b/dev/tasks/linux-packages/debian.ubuntu-trusty/libarrow-python10.install
similarity index 100%
rename from dev/tasks/linux-packages/debian.ubuntu-trusty/libarrow-python0.install
rename to dev/tasks/linux-packages/debian.ubuntu-trusty/libarrow-python10.install
diff --git a/dev/tasks/linux-packages/debian.ubuntu-trusty/libarrow0.install b/dev/tasks/linux-packages/debian.ubuntu-trusty/libarrow10.install
similarity index 100%
rename from dev/tasks/linux-packages/debian.ubuntu-trusty/libarrow0.install
rename to dev/tasks/linux-packages/debian.ubuntu-trusty/libarrow10.install
diff --git a/dev/tasks/linux-packages/debian/control b/dev/tasks/linux-packages/debian/control
index 498596ab41..ececa57e1f 100644
--- a/dev/tasks/linux-packages/debian/control
+++ b/dev/tasks/linux-packages/debian/control
@@ -26,7 +26,7 @@ Build-Depends-Indep: libglib2.0-doc
 Standards-Version: 3.9.6
 Homepage: https://arrow.apache.org/
 
-Package: libarrow0
+Package: libarrow10
 Section: libs
 Architecture: any
 Multi-Arch: same
@@ -39,7 +39,7 @@ Description: Apache Arrow is a data processing library for analysis
  .
  This package provides library files.
 
-Package: libarrow-python0
+Package: libarrow-python10
 Section: libs
 Architecture: any
 Multi-Arch: same
@@ -47,14 +47,14 @@ Pre-Depends: ${misc:Pre-Depends}
 Depends:
   ${misc:Depends},
   ${shlibs:Depends},
-  libarrow0 (= ${binary:Version}),
+  libarrow10 (= ${binary:Version}),
   python3,
   python3-numpy
 Description: Apache Arrow is a data processing library for analysis
  .
  This package provides library files for Python support.
 
-Package: libarrow-gpu0
+Package: libarrow-gpu10
 Section: libs
 Architecture: any
 Multi-Arch: same
@@ -62,7 +62,7 @@ Pre-Depends: ${misc:Pre-Depends}
 Depends:
   ${misc:Depends},
   ${shlibs:Depends},
-  libarrow0 (= ${binary:Version}),
+  libarrow10 (= ${binary:Version}),
   libnvidia-fatbinaryloader,
   libcuda1
 Description: Apache Arrow is a data processing library for analysis
@@ -75,7 +75,7 @@ Architecture: any
 Multi-Arch: same
 Depends:
   ${misc:Depends},
-  libarrow0 (= ${binary:Version})
+  libarrow10 (= ${binary:Version})
 Description: Apache Arrow is a data processing library for analysis
  .
  This package provides header files.
@@ -87,7 +87,7 @@ Multi-Arch: same
 Depends:
   ${misc:Depends},
   libarrow-dev (= ${binary:Version}),
-  libarrow-python0 (= ${binary:Version})
+  libarrow-python10 (= ${binary:Version})
 Description: Apache Arrow is a data processing library for analysis
  .
  This package provides header files for Python support.
@@ -99,7 +99,7 @@ Multi-Arch: same
 Depends:
   ${misc:Depends},
   libarrow-dev (= ${binary:Version}),
-  libarrow-gpu0 (= ${binary:Version})
+  libarrow-gpu10 (= ${binary:Version})
 Description: Apache Arrow is a data processing library for analysis
  .
  This package provides header files for GPU support.
@@ -112,7 +112,7 @@ Pre-Depends: ${misc:Pre-Depends}
 Depends:
   ${misc:Depends},
   ${shlibs:Depends},
-  libarrow0 (= ${binary:Version})
+  libarrow10 (= ${binary:Version})
 Description: Apache Arrow is a data processing library for analysis
  .
  This package provides library files.
@@ -163,7 +163,7 @@ Depends:
   ${misc:Depends},
   ${shlibs:Depends},
   libarrow-glib0 (= ${binary:Version}),
-  libarrow-gpu0 (= ${binary:Version})
+  libarrow-gpu10 (= ${binary:Version})
 Description: Apache Arrow is a data processing library for analysis
  .
  This package provides library files for GPU support.
diff --git a/dev/tasks/linux-packages/debian/libarrow-gpu0.install b/dev/tasks/linux-packages/debian/libarrow-gpu10.install
similarity index 100%
rename from dev/tasks/linux-packages/debian/libarrow-gpu0.install
rename to dev/tasks/linux-packages/debian/libarrow-gpu10.install

similarity index 100%
rename from dev/tasks/linux-packages/debian/libarrow-python0.install
rename to dev/tasks/linux-packages/debian/libarrow-python10.install
diff --git a/dev/tasks/linux-packages/debian/libarrow0.install b/dev/tasks/linux-packages/debian/libarrow10.install
similarity index 100%
rename from dev/tasks/linux-packages/debian/libarrow0.install
rename to dev/tasks/linux-packages/debian/libarrow10.install

+++ b/dev/tasks/tasks.yml

       - libarrow-gpu-glib-dev_{version}-1_amd64.deb

-      - libarrow-python0-dbgsym_{version}-1_amd64.deb
-      - libarrow-python0_{version}-1_amd64.deb
-      - libarrow0-dbgsym_{version}-1_amd64.deb
-      - libarrow0_{version}-1_amd64.deb

     platform: linux
@@ -282,10 +282,10 @@ tasks:

       - libarrow-gpu-glib0_{version}-1_amd64.deb
-      - libarrow-gpu0_{version}-1_amd64.deb

       - libarrow-python-dev_{version}-1_amd64.deb
-      - libarrow-python0_{version}-1_amd64.deb
-      - libarrow0_{version}-1_amd64.deb

+      - libarrow10_{version}-1_amd64.deb
 
   ubuntu-artful:
     platform: linux
@@ -303,10 +303,10 @@ tasks:
       - libarrow-gpu-dev_{version}-1_amd64.deb
       - libarrow-gpu-glib-dev_{version}-1_amd64.deb

   ubuntu-bionic:

@@ -324,10 +324,10 @@ tasks:

fields.summary: [Packaging] lib*.deb package name doesn't match so version
